purpleculture_pinyin:
xié
variant of 脅 |胁 ; side of the human body, from the armpit to the waist; coerce; force
вариант 脅 | 胁; сторона тела человека, от подмышки до талии; принуждение; сила
rtega_mnemonic:
脅脅RS
胁胁		脇ribs, armpits, flank, threaten
  • that to which the forceful 劦/办 flesh 月 is attached
heisig_constituent: armpit, moon, month, flesh, part of the body, triceps, power, muscle, arnold, power3, muscle3, arnold3
heisig_story: Part of the body . . . muscles (three of which give us "triceps" or "muscles on top of muscles"). You will want to keep the kanji distinct from the one that follows by paying attention to the positioning of the elements.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: armpit, the other way, another place, flank, supporting role
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: подмышки, другой путь, другое место, обрамляет, вспомогательную роль
koohiiStory1: What part of the body has a very, very, very powerful smell? The armpit, of course!
koohiiStory2: (no important on yomi) The part of Conan´s body that is three times more effective at defeating foes than his muscles are his stinky ARMPITs. [Note: Typically, when the flesh primitive is on the left side it refers to a body part - this helps distinguish in from threaten (#871)].
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: The moon has a lot of power that is power it gets from the power of every armpit of every human on earth! Why does your armpit smell? It’s because the moon is draining the power from your armpit. The moon saps power from your armpit and that power is sucked up into the sky where the moon collects the power for its own devices.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine an aura of stinky power traveling from your armpit to the moon. Feel the power leaving you as the moon saps your power through your armpits.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This is a pretty wacky (わき) armpit image isn’t it? Seeing lines of power traveling from your armpit to the moon. Definitely wacky. Have you ever seen something this wacky in real life?
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Imagine this whole scene again but keep in mind how wacky it all really is. The moon sapping power from you through your armpits? So wacky.
Ru_Meaning: armpit, the other way, another place, flank, supporting role
Ru_Notes: Фонетик: 劦 (キョウ много силы, сотрудничество), сам по себе не используется.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: if you make 3x the effort (劦) the body part (⺼) you might smell is your armpit!

Name meaning

xié
вм. 胁
Radicals: 月, 力  (moon, power)
Meaning Mnemonic
The moon has a lot of power that is power it gets from the power of every armpit of every human on earth! Why does your armpit smell? It’s because the moon is draining the power from your armpit. The moon saps power from your armpit and that power is sucked up into the sky where the moon collects the power for its own devices.
Imagine an aura of stinky power traveling from your armpit to the moon. Feel the power leaving you as the moon saps your power through your armpits.
Reading Mnemonic
This is a pretty wacky (わき) armpit image isn’t it? Seeing lines of power traveling from your armpit to the moon. Definitely wacky. Have you ever seen something this wacky in real life?
Imagine this whole scene again but keep in mind how wacky it all really is. The moon sapping power from you through your armpits? So wacky.
